Tags: Cartoon, Machine Learning, Robots, Valentine's Day

For Valentine's day, new KDnuggets cartoon looks at some problems Machine Learning can face in 2118.


By Gregory Piatetsky, KDnuggets.
For Valentine's day, new KDnuggets cartoon looks at some problems Machine Learning can face in 2118.




Female Robot: Well, if you have not learned by now what I want, I am not going to tell you!


This cartoon was ably drawn by Jon Carter.
